overview: Four brothers have been tormented for years by the abuse of their mother the Bulldog. Now more each one has its own problems to those who tend to encounter the salt. Ratón is a mechanic who takes his pains in alcohol, Alfonso watches a terrible secret of his wife. Baby finds himself halfway into drug trafficking, a decision that will ponder his life in danger and Lucina wraps up with her mother's lover. The Bulldog has created a vicious circle of abuse and pain that could destroy all of her loved ones.
title: Los hijos de la Bulldog
